TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {179967=1400 Townsend Drive,, 20416=College: 2011: Paced the Huskies in rushing with 749 yards on 165 carries … Finished tied for second in scoring with 54 points (nine touchdowns—eight rushing and one receiving) … Turned in three 100-yard games with116 yards at Ohio Dominican (10/1), 117 vs. Ferris State (11/5) and a season-high 135 at Northern Michigan (11/12) … 2010: Earned All-GLIAC Second Team accolades as a return specialist … Named the Daniel Dopp Memorial Award (Tech Special Teams Player of the Year) winner for the second time in his career … Finished third in the GLIAC in kick return average at 26.7 … Became the first Tech player to return a kickoff for a touchdown since 2001 (Jeff Dettwiler) with a run-back at Lake Erie (9/11) … Had another kick return TD vs. Northwood (10/23) on a day in which he had 159 total kick return yards and five tackles on kick coverage. He was named GLIAC Special Teams Player of the Week for his performance … Served as the team’s backup tailback, racking up 292 yards on 77 carries … Had a season-high 92 yards and two touchdowns on 21 carries in a Homecoming win over Ohio Dominican … 2009: Received a medical redshirt … Played in one game, rushing seven times for 26 yards vs. Northern Michigan (9/19) … 2008: Earned the Daniel Dopp Memorial Award as the team’s top special teams player … Saw action in nine games, starting one … Carried the ball 70 times for 375 yards and two touchdowns on the season … Had a career-high 123 yards on 17 rushes vs. Indianapolis (10/18) … Gained 98 yards on just 11 carries at Grand Valley State (9/27) … 2007: Redshirted. High School: Graduated in 2007 from Benton Harbor (Mich.) High School … Coached by Larry Featherstone … Tallied 824 yards and 11 touchdowns as a running back and 85 tackles on defense as a senior ... Named First Team All-Southwestern Conference ... Also participated in basketball and track, where he posted a 100-meters time of 10.7. Personal: Son of Montego and Charee Cason of Benton Harbor, Mich. … Born July 22, 1989, in Chicago, Ill. … Has one older brother … Enjoys running and lifting weights … Ran for Tech’s 4x100 relay team in track in 2008 and helped set the school record with a time of 42.17 … Majoring in sports and fitness management. Track: 2011 4x100m All-GLIAC Honorable Mention...2011 100m All-GLIAC Honorable Mention}
